description: Try our easy to follow Sandwich On A Stick recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Kids,Pescatarian,Seafood free,Tree nut free,Healthier Easier,Back to school,Budget,Tomato,Avocado,Spinach,Peanut free
name: Sandwich On A Stick Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 1 red capsicum, cut into 2.5cm square pieces
1 large Lebanese cucumber, thickly sliced into rounds

recipeInstructions.text: Spread half the toast with avocado and the the other half with cream cheese. Top avocado toasts with cheese slices and cut all toasts into quarters.

To make rainbow salad sandwich skewers, first thread a square of avocado toast onto skewers, plain side down. Then thread capsicum, cucumber, spinach and cabbage onto skewers, incorporating two more pieces of avocado toast in between, finishing with toast, plain side up.

To make egg salad sandwich skewers, first thread a square of cream cheese toast onto skewers, plain side down. Then thread cucumber, egg and tomatoes onto skewers, incorporating two more pieces of cream cheese toast in between, finishing with toast, plain side up. Serve.
